oracle.mapviewer.share
Class LabelingHints

java.lang.Object
  oracle.mapviewer.share.LabelingHints
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.util.Map
public class LabelingHints
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Map, java.io.Serializable

This interface contains all the public text labeling hints and parameters that can be controlled by a MapViewer user.

See Also:
Serialized Form

KEY_POINT_TEXT_GAP

public static final LabelingHints.Key KEY_POINT_TEXT_GAP
hint for space between text and target point feature (oriented or not) -- key
Note that its value must be an Integer object reprsenting the space in number of pixels.

KEY_LINE_FOLLOW_LINE

public static final LabelingHints.Key KEY_LINE_FOLLOW_LINE
Wether the label should closely follow the path of the line being labeled. Value must be an Boolean object. If set to False, then use straight labels only.

VALUE_LINE_FOLLOW_LINE_ON

public static final java.lang.Object VALUE_LINE_FOLLOW_LINE_ON

line-text horizontal alignment hint.

public static final java.lang.Object VALUE_LINE_HALIGN_START
line-text horizontal alignment value -- text should be placed on the beginning portion of the line feature

POLYGON_LABELING_HINT_HORIZONTAL_ONLY

public static final int POLYGON_LABELING_HINT_HORIZONTAL_ONLY
Whether labels must always be horizontal. If set to TRUE, then polygon labels must be horizontal when displayed. (bug 3622230).
